title.narrative: National Highway Development Sector Investment Program-Project 1

description.narrative: The proposed project is designed to achieve three specific objectives: (i) improve road sector efficiency on the main transport corridors in Pakistan, (ii) support regional cooperation by removing or relaxing physical, institutional and other barriers to improve transportation and increase trade; and (iii) institutional capacity building of NHA.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: 1. National Highway NetworK: Improve road sector efficiency on the main transport corridors in Pakistan.
